sub_title: I help Microsoft Dynamics 365 partners and their customers to transform and stay relevant. How can I help you?
summary:
- Over 30 years experience in the software business - over 20 years in Microsoft Dynamics 
- Great understanding of the marketing, sales, delivery and support of ERP and CRM solutions
- Deep knowledge of Dynamics ERP, CRM and Dynamics 365 
- Strong 'out-of-the-box-thinking' capabilities
- Creator of ERP/CRM Masterclasses and the Executive Change Masterclasses for C-level
- Provocative thought leader in Digital Transformation - both for partners and for end-customers 
- Talented to get even your senior management moving    ;-)
- Author of several successful books on success in ERP, CRM and Digital Transformation  
- Business trainer/coach, delivering in different countries, cultures and languages 
- An experienced, provocative and inspiring presenter for your next event!
- Valuable sparring partner for the management of ambitious D365 partners

Just give me a call if you're looking for inspiration. You won't regret that step! 

www.dynamicsandmore.com
E: gk@dynamicsandmore.com

#Microsoft; #Microsoftpartners; #Dynamics365; #DigitalTransformation

treasury_media.title: Guus Krabbenborg, Dynamics & More
treasury_media.description: Successful Dutch Microsoft Dynamics 365 partner Datamex invited me to be the moderator at their virtual customer event. Part of this role was an interview where I talked about the success and fail factors of Digital Transformation projects, the need to strive for maximum customer happiness and the challenges of changing mindset and company culture.

treasury_media.title: Keynote presentation at Handelsforum 2020
treasury_media.description: On september 25th 2020, the successful German D365 partner SIEVERS GROUP organised her Handelsforum 2020 event. I was invited to deliver the keynote presentation on the transformation part of Digital Transformation. The title of my (German) session was 'Die Top 3 Erfolgsfaktoren für Digitale Transformation in Handelsunternehmen – sind Sie bereit?

treasury_media.title: 7 super practical tips to master the digital transformation
treasury_media.description: Business Central Manufacturing Show - episode 7. This interview with Guus Krabbenborg reveals seven tips on how to master the digital transformation.

treasury_media.title: My new book on Business Transformation - read here how you can benefit from it!
treasury_media.description: Digital Transformation is a great opportunity to rethink the position of your customers. To create business models that contribute to customer happiness. And to select an IT platform that support all this. Unfortunately, most CEO’s believe that Digital Transformation is just another IT project. This book will help them understand it's their job. And teaches them how to achieve Project Success. You can publish this book in your own edition to create more leads, more trust and more deals.

authors.headline: I help Microsoft Dynamics 365 partners and their customers to transform and stay relevant. How can I help you?

profile_positions.description:
My latest activity is a company called Dynamics and More. With this initiative I support Microsoft Dynamics 365 partners and their customers and prospects with high impact services in the domains of Strategy, Digital transformation, Organisational change, Marketing, Sales and Project success. 

For the marketeers in the D365 channel, I create business relevant content for partners, like books, checklists and blogs. I have a unique 'Content-as-a-Service' offering that helps you making your website and your newletters more attractive. Check the services area on my website to learn more.  

I'm also active as a valuable presenter at partner events - both on location as well as online. Find details  plus recommendations from colleague D365 partners on my website in 'Spice up your events'.   

Pretty popular these days is my Project Excellence workshop. That is a 2-day session, preferably on location, with your complete team. The goal is to help you and your team prepare for the challenges of a Cloud First world, where your customers expect nothing less than Project Success!  

Check here for details: www.dynamicsandmore.com/services/building-cloud-business-skills

Another popular service are my so called ERP Masterclasses. They are available in 2 flavors: 

- a 1-day workshop for potential customers where I teach them HOW to select, contract, implement and use their new system. Focused on prospects who are 6 to 24 months away from their decision

-  and a second 1-day workshop focused on the shortlist phase or first step of the implementation. Meant for the management of your prospect or net new customer. Focused on success in their organisational change processes

Check www.dynamicsandmore.com/services/help-your-customers-succeed
  
There are many other topics and domains where I help D365 partners and their current and future customer to create success. So how can I help you?

www.dynamicsandmore.com
E: gk@dynamicsandmore.com
profile_positions.title: Founder and owner

profile_positions.description: With over 1.000 Microsoft Dynamics SMB partners (VAR's and ISV's), QBS Group is the biggest and fastest growing Value Added SMB Distributor (aka 'Master VAR') in the Microsoft Dynamics channel worldwide. Today we serve Dynamics partners in 25+ countries in Europe, Middle-East and Africa. This company manages and supports Dynamics 365 partners in domains like business transformation, cloud adoption, CSP, marketing, sales, training & coaching, solution development, and customer service. On top of that, many Microsoft partners with a CRM practice and O365 partners join this growing value-add eco-system as well. So what are you waiting for?   ;-)
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder and Co-Owner

profile_positions.description: Partner Master Class was a very successful company that trained and coached Microsoft Dynamics partners in business skills. Microsoft called us a 'Partner Development Center'. We've delivered high-impact training programs to hundreds of partner companies all over the world. From Iceland and Portugal to Australia and from South-Africa and Saudi Arabia to Russia. Today, all Partner Master Class activities are incorporated in QBS Group.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder and Co-Owner

profile_positions.description: At TerDege I was working for Microsoft Dynamics partners and their customers by means of training, coaching and delivering guidance. I delivered 'ERP and CRM Masterclass' workshops for prospective customers on the selection and implementation of new business software. Most well-known however, was my bi-weekly newsletter 'Terdege's Nieuws' for the MBS community with over 2.000 fanatical Dynamics professionals in The Netherlands and Belgium as my audience. Today, Dynamics partners still ask me when this newsletter will return... Well, who knows?! I also was a frequent blogger and wrote a few books on ERP and CRM project success.
profile_positions.title: Founder and owner

profile_positions.description: At Navision Software in The Netherlands I was responsible for sales, partner recruitment, marketing and product management. A great opportunity for me to share all my learnings as a business owner in DBS Business Solutions with a growing partner channel!
profile_positions.title: Commercial Director

profile_positions.description: This company started as a Management Buy-out from Digital Equipment. I was one of the three shareholders. We grew the company in 5 years time from 48 at the start to 120 people when I left. The results improved from negative to pretty profitable and the same happened with the customer satisfaction.
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description: In the first 2 years I continued my role as business unit manager for local government.  After the sale of those activities in 1993, I was commercially responsible for the business activities in the 5 area offices with a focus on the SMB market.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Director

profile_positions.description: At first, responsible for selling the complete Philips portfolio to municipalities in the South of Netherlands. In my second role as business unit manager I was end responsible for all Philips Telecommunication and Information Systems activities in the local government market, where I led a team of 30 professionals.
profile_positions.title: Account manager & Business Unit manager
